donation.title: Hearts United: A Home for Every Child Fund
donation.content: Hearts United is dedicated to providing a loving home for every child. Your monetary contributions to our 'A Home for Every Child Fund' enable us to support orphaned and vulnerable children by providing shelter, education, and a nurturing environment. Join us in building a future filled with hope for these young hearts.

faqs.question: How can I donate?
faqs.answer: You can securely contribute funds through various payment methods, ensuring your support reaches children in need of a loving home in.

faqs.question: Can I sponsor a specific child with my donation?
faqs.answer: While we don't currently offer individual child sponsorship, your contribution will collectively support our efforts to provide a home, education, and care for all the children under the 'Hearts United' program.

faqs.question: How is the donated money used to help orphaned children?
faqs.answer: Donations are utilized to cover essential needs such as housing, education, healthcare, and emotional support for orphaned and vulnerable children. Our goal is to create a stable and loving environment for each child's well-being.

faqs.question: Are there updates on the impact of my donations?
faqs.answer: Yes, we regularly provide updates on the impact of donations through our website and newsletters. You'll have the opportunity to see how your contributions are making a positive difference in the lives of the children we serve.

rewards.title: Bronze Supporter
rewards.content: Receive a thank-you email and recognition on our website.

rewards.title: Silver Supporter
rewards.content: In addition to Bronze benefits, get a personalized certificate.

rewards.title: Gold Supporter
rewards.content: In addition to Silver benefits, receive a special gift.

rewards.title: Platinum Supporter
rewards.content: In addition to Gold benefits, join our exclusive supporters club.
